general.name: CIS Benchmark Enforcement | Universal Control 2
general.description: This is a profile created to remedy and enforce the CIS Benchmark Recommendations for Universal Control
general.payloads: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE plist PUBLIC "-//Apple//DTD PLIST 1.0//EN" "http://www.apple.com/DTDs/PropertyList-1.0.dtd"> <plist version="1"><dict><key>PayloadUUID</key><string>398ABAC1-52A5-484D-9F8D-9E5A5FA2FBE1</string><key>PayloadType</key><string>Configuration</string><key>PayloadOrganization</key><string>Parachute Test</string><key>PayloadIdentifier</key><string>398ABAC1-52A5-484D-9F8D-9E5A5FA2FBE1</string><key>PayloadDisplayName</key><string>CIS Benchmark Enforcement | Universal Control 2</string><key>PayloadDescription</key><string>This is a profile created to remedy and enforce the CIS Benchmark Recommendations for Universal Control</string><key>PayloadVersion</key><integer>1</integer><key>PayloadEnabled</key><true/><key>PayloadRemovalDisallowed</key><true/><key>PayloadScope</key><string>System</string><key>PayloadContent</key><array><dict><key>PayloadDisplayName</key><string>Custom Settings</string><key>PayloadIdentifier</key><string>349909B2-FAB9-4D79-88B3-1FB0C41BAF35</string><key>PayloadOrganization</key><string>JAMF Software</string><key>PayloadType</key><string>com.apple.ManagedClient.preferences</string><key>PayloadUUID</key><string>349909B2-FAB9-4D79-88B3-1FB0C41BAF35</string><key>PayloadVersion</key><integer>1</integer><key>PayloadContent</key><dict><key>com.apple.universalcontrol</key><dict><key>Forced</key><array><dict><key>mcx_preference_settings</key><dict><key>PayloadDisplayName</key><string>Universal Control Settings</string><key>PayloadIdentifier</key><string>com.example.universalcontrol.settings</string><key>PayloadType</key><string>Configuration</string><key>PayloadUUID</key><string>5D6F5C5B-4A3C-4E2A-B2D4-3A4B1E82ABCD</string><key>PayloadVersion</key><integer>1</integer><key>PayloadContent</key><dict><key>com.apple.universalcontrol</key><dict><key>Disable</key><true/></dict></dict></dict></dict></array></dict></dict></dict></array></dict></plist>
